alert.note: Alert for Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Columbia County through 715 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Five Points, or over Lake City, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and localized flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Watertown and Five Points. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
